title: ​Stocks to buy in 2026 for long term: Adani Ports, Ventive Hospitality among 5 stocks that could give 10-40% return
description: Brokerages are selectively optimistic about select infrastructure, consumer, industrial, and hospitality stocks.  Adani Ports, Varun Beverages, Exide Industries, Pidilite Industries, and Ventive Hospitality are among those with potential for significant returns.  These recommendations suggest meaningful upside from current market prices. Investors can consider these stocks for long-term growth.

title: Force Motors shares in focus as Q3 profit jumps 250% YoY to Rs 406 crore
description: Shares of Force Motors will be in focus after the company reported a sharp surge in Q3 profitability, aided by strong operating momentum and a one-off gain. Consolidated net profit jumped 252% YoY to Rs 406.1 crore, while revenue rose 12.6% to Rs 2,128 crore. EBITDA climbed 61.4%, reflecting margin expansion and improved demand conditions.

title: Marico shares in focus on acquiring wellness brand for Rs 375 crore. Here’s everything you need to know
description: FMCG major Marico is set to acquire a 60% stake in plant-based nutrition brand Cosmix Wellness for approximately Rs 375 crore. This strategic move strengthens Marico's digital-first portfolio and positions it in the rapidly growing wellness segment. The acquisition aims to accelerate Cosmix's growth and expand into adjacent wellness categories.

title: Anthropic AI plug-ins creating chaos in IT stocks. Too early for you to plug out?
description: Indian IT stocks are experiencing significant selling pressure following the launch of AI-powered workplace tools, leading to a market value evaporation of billions. While some analysts label this a "SaaSpocalypse," others argue the market is overreacting, with AI potentially driving transformation rather than outright decline for the sector.

title: Tax increase shakes India’s $36 billion arbitrage trade
description: India's arbitrage fund managers anticipate reduced returns following a surprise tax hike on equity derivatives. This move, aimed at curbing speculation, impacts arbitrage funds by increasing operational costs and potentially lowering investor yields. While the sector has seen significant growth, the tax change could affect strategies and profitability, though some experts believe the market's dynamic nature may offer some mitigation.

title: India bonds rally may taper ahead of RBI debt purchase, rate decision
description: Today marks a pivotal moment for Indian bond investors as they set their sights on a crucial yield target ahead of a central bank's impending bond acquisition. The air is thick with expectation for tomorrow's monetary policy update, where many foresee proactive measures aimed at enhancing liquidity.

title: JSW Cement shares in focus after Q3 profit turnaround; revenue up 13%
description: JSW Cement shares are set to remain in focus after the company posted a Q3 FY26 profit turnaround, with revenue rising 13% year on year. Strong volume growth, improved margins, a credit rating upgrade, and an aggressive expansion strategy underline the company’s improving operational and financial position.
